Name: TowerMancer
About the game: TowerMancer, a challenging strategy tower building game. Gather resources, build rooms, face menacing threats and meet The Lich family! 15 Campaign Levels Follow the TowerMancer story becoming the powerful being that he is destined to! 18 Challenges Branches and side contracts will challenge your skills against all the odds! 2 Game Modes (Campaign / Random Mode) Meet the Lich family and fulfill contracts to become a master of your trade, or sharpen your skills in random contracts. Unlockables Venturing with side contracts may award you benefits to assist you in this journey. Long ago The Lich, the most powerful mage of the underworld... found love within the cold grasp of The Lichmancer, a necromancer whose powers could rise an army of its own... Together they traveled and conquered the depths... And eventually came their offspring, Lesser Lichs, each with its own passion on the afterlife! You are the youngest son, following your burning desire to be a TOWERMANCER!
